/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. Cars and buses, the arteries of the city, move along the road, their colors muted against the backdrop of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a snapshot of urban life, a moment frozen in time amidst the constant motion of the city.
